title: Japan Government Statistics Data
description: A structured dataset containing statistical data points extracted from the e-Stat portal. Each item represents a single statistical measure with its associated categories and values.

statName.title: Statistic Name
statName.description: The official name of the statistic (e.g., "国勢調査 人口総数").

surveyDate.title: Survey Date
surveyDate.description: The date or period of the survey (e.g., "2020年").

region.title: Region
region.description: The geographical area the data pertains to (e.g., "全国" for 'All Japan').

category1.title: Primary Category
category1.description: The primary data category, providing the main classification for the value.

category2.title: Secondary Category
category2.description: A secondary data category for more detailed classification.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The unit of measurement for the value (e.g., "人" for 'people', "円" for 'yen').

sourceTableId.title: Source Table ID
sourceTableId.description: The unique identifier for the source table in the e-Stat database, useful for cross-referencing.

dataType.title: Data Type
dataType.description: An inferred data type (e.g., 'population', 'economic') to help with filtering and analysis.

lastUpdated.title: Last Updated
lastUpdated.description: The date the source data was last updated by the provider, in ISO 8601 format.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: A comprehensive object containing detailed metadata about the data's source and structure (if requested).

extractedAt.title: Extracted At
extractedAt.description: The timestamp when the data was extracted by the Actor, in ISO 8601 format.
